Do you remember when......
What are now called "Frozen Dinners" and come in a plastic tray with clear plastic over the top were called "TV Dinners" and came in an aluminum tray with aluminum foil over the top? And what was your favorite among the many that were available? Remember the two major brands? Asked by OldHippieHatesNewAV 57 months ago Similar Questions: remember Recent Questions About: remember Food&Drink > Food Answer OldHippieHatesNewAV's question Answers Answer from roseredcity
